mn58:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
mn58:2.1: Atha kho abhayo rajakumaro yena nigantho nataputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva nigantham nataputtam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho abhayam rajakumaram nigantho nataputto etadavoca:
mn58:3.1: “ehi tvam, rajakumara, samanassa gotamassa vadam aropehi.
mn58:3.3: ‘abhayena rajakumarena samanassa gotamassa evam mahiddhikassa evam mahanubhavassa vado aropito’”ti.
mn58:3.4: “Yatha katham panaham, bhante, samanassa gotamassa evam mahiddhikassa evam mahanubhavassa vadam aropessami”ti?
mn58:3.5: “Ehi tvam, rajakumara, yena samano gotamo tenupasankama; upasankamitva samanam gotamam evam vadehi:
mn58:3.6: ‘bhaseyya nu kho, bhante, tathagato tam vacam ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa’ti?
mn58:3.7: Sace te samano gotamo evam puttho evam byakaroti:
mn58:3.8: ‘bhaseyya, rajakumara, tathagato tam vacam ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa’ti, tamenam tvam evam vadeyyasi:
mn58:3.10: Puthujjanopi hi tam vacam bhaseyya ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa’ti.
mn58:3.11: Sace pana te samano gotamo evam puttho evam byakaroti:
mn58:3.12: ‘na, rajakumara, tathagato tam vacam bhaseyya ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa’ti, tamenam tvam evam vadeyyasi:
mn58:3.14: “apayiko devadatto, nerayiko devadatto, kappattho devadatto, atekiccho devadatto”ti?
mn58:3.15: Taya ca pana te vacaya devadatto kupito ahosi anattamano’ti.
mn58:3.16: Imam kho te, rajakumara, samano gotamo ubhatokotikam panham puttho samano neva sakkhiti uggilitum na sakkhiti ogilitum.
mn58:3.17: Seyyathapi nama purisassa ayosinghatakam kanthe vilaggam, so neva sakkuneyya uggilitum na sakkuneyya ogilitum;
mn58:3.18: evameva kho te, rajakumara, samano gotamo imam ubhatokotikam panham puttho samano neva sakkhiti uggilitum na sakkhiti ogilitun”ti.
mn58:4.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho abhayo rajakumaro niganthassa nataputtassa patissutva utthayasana nigantham nataputtam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn58:4.2: Ekamantam nisinnassa kho abhayassa rajakumarassa suriyam ulloketva etadahosi:
mn58:4.4: Sve danaham sake nivesane bhagavato vadam aropessami”ti bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn58:4.5: “adhivasetu me, bhante, bhagava svatanaya attacatuttho bhattan”ti.
mn58:5.1: Atha kho abhayo rajakumaro bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
mn58:5.2: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena abhayassa rajakumarassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
mn58:5.3: Atha kho abhayo rajakumaro bhagavantam panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
mn58:5.4: Atha kho abhayo rajakumaro bhagavantam bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn58:6.1: Ekamantam nisinno kho abhayo rajakumaro bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn58:6.2: “bhaseyya nu kho, bhante, tathagato tam vacam ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa”ti?
mn58:6.7: “Idhaham, bhante, yena nigantho nataputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva nigantham nataputtam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidim. Ekamantam nisinnam kho mam, bhante, nigantho nataputto etadavoca:
mn58:6.8: ‘ehi tvam, rajakumara, samanassa gotamassa vadam aropehi.
mn58:6.10: abhayena rajakumarena samanassa gotamassa evam mahiddhikassa evam mahanubhavassa vado aropito’ti.
mn58:6.11: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, nigantham nataputtam etadavocam:
mn58:6.12: ‘yatha katham panaham, bhante, samanassa gotamassa evam mahiddhikassa evam mahanubhavassa vadam aropessami’ti?
mn58:6.13: ‘Ehi tvam, rajakumara, yena samano gotamo tenupasankama; upasankamitva samanam gotamam evam vadehi:
mn58:6.14: “bhaseyya nu kho, bhante, tathagato tam vacam ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa”ti?
mn58:6.15: Sace te samano gotamo evam puttho evam byakaroti:
mn58:6.16: “bhaseyya, rajakumara, tathagato tam vacam ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa”ti, tamenam tvam evam vadeyyasi:
mn58:6.18: Puthujjanopi hi tam vacam bhaseyya ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa”ti.
mn58:6.19: Sace pana te samano gotamo evam puttho evam byakaroti:
mn58:6.20: “na, rajakumara, tathagato tam vacam bhaseyya ya sa vaca paresam appiya amanapa”ti, tamenam tvam evam vadeyyasi—
mn58:6.21: atha kincarahi te, bhante, devadatto byakato:
mn58:6.22: “apayiko devadatto, nerayiko devadatto, kappattho devadatto, atekiccho devadatto”ti?
mn58:6.23: Taya ca pana te vacaya devadatto kupito ahosi anattamano’ti.
mn58:6.24: Imam kho te, rajakumara, samano gotamo ubhatokotikam panham puttho samano neva sakkhiti uggilitum na sakkhiti ogilitum.
mn58:6.25: Seyyathapi nama purisassa ayosinghatakam kanthe vilaggam, so neva sakkuneyya uggilitum na sakkuneyya ogilitum;
mn58:6.26: evameva kho te, rajakumara, samano gotamo imam ubhatokotikam panham puttho samano neva sakkhiti uggilitum na sakkhiti ogilitun”ti.
mn58:7.1: Tena kho pana samayena daharo kumaro mando uttanaseyyako abhayassa rajakumarassa anke nisinno hoti.
mn58:7.2: Atha kho bhagava abhayam rajakumaram etadavoca:
mn58:7.4: sacayam kumaro tuyham va pamadamanvaya dhatiya va pamadamanvaya kattham va kathalam va mukhe ahareyya, kinti nam kareyyasi”ti?
mn58:7.6: Sace, bhante, na sakkuneyyam adikeneva ahattum, vamena hatthena sisam pariggahetva dakkhinena hatthena vankangulim karitva salohitampi ahareyyam.
mn58:8.1: “Evameva kho, rajakumara, yam tathagato vacam janati abhutam ataccham anatthasamhitam sa ca paresam appiya amanapa, na tam tathagato vacam bhasati.
mn58:8.2: Yampi tathagato vacam janati bhutam taccham anatthasamhitam sa ca paresam appiya amanapa, tampi tathagato vacam na bhasati.
mn58:8.3: Yanca kho tathagato vacam janati bhutam taccham atthasamhitam sa ca paresam appiya amanapa, tatra kalannu tathagato hoti tassa vacaya veyyakaranaya.
mn58:8.4: Yam tathagato vacam janati abhutam ataccham anatthasamhitam sa ca paresam piya manapa, na tam tathagato vacam bhasati.
mn58:8.5: Yampi tathagato vacam janati bhutam taccham anatthasamhitam sa ca paresam piya manapa tampi tathagato vacam na bhasati.
mn58:8.6: Yanca tathagato vacam janati bhutam taccham atthasamhitam sa ca paresam piya manapa, tatra kalannu tathagato hoti tassa vacaya veyyakaranaya.
mn58:9.1: “Yeme, bhante, khattiyapanditapi brahmanapanditapi gahapatipanditapi samanapanditapi panham abhisankharitva tathagatam upasankamitva pucchanti,
mn58:9.2: pubbeva nu kho, etam, bhante, bhagavato cetaso parivitakkitam hoti ‘ye mam upasankamitva evam pucchissanti tesaham evam puttho evam byakarissami’ti, udahu thanasovetam tathagatam patibhati”ti?
mn58:10.1: “Tena hi, rajakumara, tannevettha patipucchissami, yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
mn58:10.8: Pubbeva nu kho te etam cetaso parivitakkitam assa ‘ye mam upasankamitva evam pucchissanti tesaham evam puttho evam byakarissami’ti, udahu thanasovetam patibhaseyya”ti?
mn58:10.9: “Ahanhi, bhante, rathiko sannato kusalo rathassa angapaccanganam.
mn58:11.1: “Evameva kho, rajakumara, ye te khattiyapanditapi brahmanapanditapi gahapatipanditapi samanapanditapi panham abhisankharitva tathagatam upasankamitva pucchanti, thanasovetam tathagatam patibhati.
mn58:11.3: Sa hi, rajakumara, tathagatassa dhammadhatu suppatividdha yassa dhammadhatuya suppatividdhatta thanasovetam tathagatam patibhati”ti.
mn58:12.1: Evam vutte, abhayo rajakumaro bhagavantam etadavoca:
